testcase.name: User should open a new account successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in.....................................................passed When user navigates to Open New Account.....................................passed And selects account type and submits........................................passed Then new account is created and shown to user...............................passed

testcase.name: Accounts Overview displays correct information
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in.....................................................passed When user goes to Accounts Overview.........................................passed Then the list of user accounts should be displayed..........................passed

testcase.name: User should logout successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in.....................................................passed When user clicks logout.....................................................passed Then user should be redirected to login page................................passed

testcase.name: User pays bill with valid details
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in.....................................................passed When user navigates to Bill Pay.............................................passed And enters valid payee and account information..............................passed Then bill payment should complete...........................................passed

testcase.name: Bill Payment error with missing mandatory fields
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in.....................................................passed When user leaves required fields blank on Bill Pay page.....................passed Then application should show field validation messages......................passed

testcase.name: Bill Payment error with invalid payment amount
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in.....................................................passed When user enters invalid amount.............................................passed Then appropriate error message displayed....................................passed

testcase.name: Successful new user registration
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Parabank Registration page.................................passed When user enters valid details..............................................passed And clicks on Register button...............................................passed Then user account should be created successfully............................passed

testcase.name: Registration fails with missing mandatory fields
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Parabank Registration page.................................passed When user leaves mandatory fields blank.....................................passed And clicks on Register button...............................................passed Then error message should be displayed......................................passed

testcase.name: Registration with mismatching passwords
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Parabank Registration page.................................passed When user enters mismatching password and confirm password..................passed And clicks on Register button...............................................passed Then a password mismatch error should display...............................passed

testcase.name: Transfer funds successfully between two valid accounts
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in.....................................................passed When user goes to Transfer Funds............................................passed And enters valid From Account, To Account and Amount........................passed Then transfer should be successful..........................................passed

testcase.name: Transfer fails when insufficient balance
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in.....................................................passed When user enters amount greater than account balance........................passed Then error “Insufficient funds” should appear...............................passed

testcase.name: Transfer fails with invalid account data
testcase.system-out: Given user is logged in.....................................................passed When user enters invalid account numbers....................................passed Then proper invalid account error message should show.......................passed

testcase.name: Valid user should login successfully
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Parabank Login page........................................passed When user enters correct username and password..............................passed And clicks Login............................................................passed Then user should land on Account Overview page..............................passed

testcase.name: Invalid username/password should display error
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Parabank Login page........................................passed When user enters invalid credentials........................................passed Then appropriate error message should show..................................passed

testcase.name: Login without entering credentials
testcase.system-out: Given user is on Parabank Login page........................................passed When user clicks Login without entering credentials.........................passed Then proper validation error should appear..................................passed
